name: Russian Car Lada Racing 3D
description:
Like Russian cars? Interesting int Russian car industry? Or maybe it was always interesting how to behave in these races Lada auto? Then this game is for you!

Feel like a real racer driving a Lada. Overtaking all his rivals, and come to the finish line first!

Do not like the stock performance of the machine? Pimp my wheelbarrow! This section will help you tuning! Earn money for the race and put them in your car! Come to the finish line first!

HOW TO PLAY:
Choose your Lada, VAZ from 2101 to 2114, and drove! Become a champion in the race for Russian cars!

Main Features:
- Amazing 3D graphics and full of detail Russian cars
- Intuitive controls - Accelerometer or arrows
- Realistic physics cars
- User-friendly interface
- Interesting opponents

Want to feel like a real racer? So go ahead! Click on the gas while driving in the game Russian Car Lada Racing 3D!
